contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} '''Knox''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} == People == <!-- Only list people here who are commonly referenced as "Knox" only --> * [[Knox (surname)]], including list of persons with the surname * [[Knox (musician)]], guitarist, singer and songwriter of original UK punk rock band The Vibrators * [[Knox Cameron]], a Jamaican-American soccer striker * General [[Henry Knox]], officer in the American Revolution and later Secretary of War == Buildings and structures == * [[Albright-Knox Art Gallery]], a major showplace for modern art and contemporary art in the western New York Region * [[Blaw-Knox tower]], a guyed tower for medium wave transmission with a diamond-shape form * [[Fort Knox]], a United States Army post in Kentucky ** [[United States Bullion Depository]], commonly called "Fort Knox", a high security storage facility * [[Fort Knox (Maine)]], a fort located on the Penobscot River in Prospect, Maine * [[Knox Memorial Bridge]], a bridge that crosses the Intracoastal Waterway north of Ormond Beach, Florida * [[Westfield Knox]], a shopping centre in Wantirna South, a suburb of Melbourne, Victoria * [[John Knox House]], an historic house in Edinburgh, Scotland === Churches === * [[Knox United Church (Calgary)]] * [[Knox Presbyterian Church (Oakville)]] * [[Knox Presbyterian Church (Ottawa)]] * [[Knox Presbyterian Church (Toronto)]] * [[Knox United Church (Scarborough)]], a Presbyterian Church in Scarborough, Ontario === Schools === * [[Knox College (Illinois)]], a liberal arts college in Galesburg, Illinois * [[Knox College, Otago]], one of the constituent colleges of the University of Otago in New Zealand * [[Knox College, University of Toronto]], a theological college in Toronto, Ontario, Canada * [[Knox Grammar School]] in New South Wales, Australia * [[The Knox School (Australia)]], in Wantirna South, a suburb of Melbourne, Victoria, Australia == Places == === United States === * [[Knox, Indiana]] * [[Knox, Henry County, Indiana]] * [[Knox, Maine]] * [[Knox, New York]] * [[Knox, North Dakota]] * [[Knox, Pennsylvania]] * [[Knox, Wisconsin]] * [[Knox City, Missouri]] * [[Knox City, Texas]] === Other === * [[Knox Coast]], the coast of Antarctica lying between Cape Hordern and the Hatch Islands * [[City of Knox]], Victoria, Australia * [[Knox Atoll]], Marshall Islands == Navy ships == * [[Knox class frigate]], a class of United States Navy ships * [[USS Frank Knox (DD-742)|USS ''Frank Knox'' (DD-742)]], a ''Gearing''-class destroyer in the United States Navy during World War II * [[USS Knox (FF-1052)|USS ''Knox'' (FF-1052)]], the prototype and lead ship of the Knox class of destroyer escorts == Other uses == * Knox Overstreet, a character in the film ''[[Dead Poets Society]]'' * [[Knox Automobile]], an American Brass Era car manufacturer * [[Knox Basketball Inc]], a basketball association in Melbourne, Australia * [[Knox Box]], a small, wall-mounted safe that holds building keys for firefighters to retrieve in emergencies * [[Knox Fellowship]], fellowships affiliated with Harvard University, given in honor of Frank Knox * [[Knox gelatin]], a brand of gelatin now marketed by Kraft Foods * [[Knox Mine disaster]], a mining accident that took place near the village of Port Griffith in Jenkins Township, Pennsylvania * [[Knox's Translation of the Vulgate]] (the Knox Bible), a twentieth century translation of the Bible by Msgr. Ronald Knox * [[Samsung Knox]], an enterprise mobile security solution == See also == * [[Knox County (disambiguation)]] * [[KNOX (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
